page.title: 09Egton Brownies
page.content:
**{Egton Brownies}**
The{Brownies}meet on Wednesdays in the {Village Hall}at 6 pm. They start at the age of 7 and leave at 11. When it starts, "subs." are paid at 10p a week. This goes towards trips & heating the{village hall.
Children come from{Lealholm, Glaisdale and{Egton.}We play games and tackle Challenges. Our leader checks our Brownie uniforms, hands, nails, shoes and faces. We have parties, competitions and work for badges like helping at home & cooking etc.
At 7.30 we say a prayer and goodnight to everybody, sometimes we have a task to do for the next meeting.
By Rachel Flintoft.
